content.query:
create MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='Azure@143';

create DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL youtube_project
WITH
    IDENTITY ='Managed identity'

create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_silver
WITH
(
    LOCATION= 'https://datalakesynapsee.dfs.core.windows.net/youtubesilver',
    CREDENTIAL = youtube_project
)

create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_gold
WITH
(
    LOCATION= 'https://datalakesynapsee.dfs.core.windows.net/youtubegold',
    CREDENTIAL = youtube_project
)


create EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT format_parquet
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)


------------------------
--Create External tables Extsales--------------------

drop EXTERNAL TABLE gold.extsales;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.extsales
WITH
(
    LOCATION='extsales',
    DATA_SOURCE=source_gold,
    FILE_FORMAT=format_parquet
)
AS
SELECT * from gold.Sales

------------------------

create EXTERNAL table gold.productstb
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'Products',
    DATA_SOURCE=source_gold,
    FILE_FORMAT=format_parquet
)
AS
SELECT * from gold.Products
